au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=10m_L2=6m_centra
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.00) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(5800,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g4 driveGuide(guideConfig.g4) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(3) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 94.12) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.76)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(40, 100) # Drive attenuator to 330 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(40, 0) driveBsz(258)
